partpayment.description: Down payment (or invoice in post boc). Until 12 months down payment without interest, or longer period with low interest

card.description: Up to 60 days down payment without interest with option for part payment.

invoice.description: 30-60 dagers betalingsfrist. Fakturaen sendes via e-post.

partpayment.description: Delbetal rentefritt opptil 12 måneder eller velg en lengre periode med lav rente. Se egne vilkår
